name: HIKAYAT SERIES : IBNU ABBAS
description:

This hikayat series has a conversation in Arab Pegon Text between Ibnu Abbas and Ali R.A. Presenting ini black and white, contain figures who adapted from miniature art style. Then this image develops into a specific image in the form of a video without sound to give a sparkling sensation.
